mapper.select: select id, kmz_name, kmz_path, kmz_type, kmz_version, kmz_size, kmz_distance, kmz_duration, kmz_create_time, kmz_create_by_user_id, kmz_update_time, kmz_update_by_user_id, kmz_company_id, kmz_des from ef_task_kmz where id = #{id}

select id, kmz_name, kmz_path, kmz_type, kmz_version, kmz_size, kmz_distance, kmz_duration, kmz_create_time, kmz_create_by_user_id, kmz_update_time, kmz_update_by_user_id, kmz_company_id, kmz_des from ef_task_kmz limit #{offset}, #{limit}
select * from ef_task_kmz where kmz_company_id = #{cid} order by kmz_update_time desc
select count(id) from ef_task_kmz where kmz_company_id = #{cid} and kmz_name= #{fileName}
select * from ef_task_kmz Where kmz_company_id =#{UcId} AND kmz_update_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} ORDER BY kmz_update_time DESC
mapper.insert: insert into ef_task_kmz(kmz_name, kmz_path, kmz_type, kmz_version, kmz_size, kmz_distance, kmz_duration, kmz_create_time, kmz_create_by_user_id, kmz_update_time, kmz_update_by_user_id, kmz_company_id, kmz_des,kmz_create_user,kmz_update_user,kmz_current_wp_no,kmz_wp_count) values (#{kmzName}, #{kmzPath}, #{kmzType}, #{kmzVersion}, #{kmzSize}, #{kmzDistance}, #{kmzDuration}, #{kmzCreateTime}, #{kmzCreateByUserId}, #{kmzUpdateTime}, #{kmzUpdateByUserId}, #{kmzCompanyId}, #{kmzDes},#{kmzCreateUser},#{kmzUpdateUser},#{kmzCurrentWpNo},#{kmzWpCount})

insert into ef_task_kmz(kmz_name, kmz_path, kmz_type, kmz_version, kmz_size, kmz_distance, kmz_duration, kmz_create_time, kmz_create_by_user_id, kmz_update_time, kmz_update_by_user_id, kmz_company_id, kmz_des) values
(#{entity.kmzName}, #{entity.kmzPath}, #{entity.kmzType}, #{entity.kmzVersion}, #{entity.kmzSize}, #{entity.kmzDistance}, #{entity.kmzDuration}, #{entity.kmzCreateTime}, #{entity.kmzCreateByUserId}, #{entity.kmzUpdateTime}, #{entity.kmzUpdateByUserId}, #{entity.kmzCompanyId}, #{entity.kmzDes})

insert into ef_task_kmz(kmz_name, kmz_path, kmz_type, kmz_version, kmz_size, kmz_distance, kmz_duration, kmz_create_time, kmz_create_by_user_id, kmz_update_time, kmz_update_by_user_id, kmz_company_id, kmz_des) values
(#{entity.kmzName}, #{entity.kmzPath}, #{entity.kmzType}, #{entity.kmzVersion}, #{entity.kmzSize}, #{entity.kmzDistance}, #{entity.kmzDuration}, #{entity.kmzCreateTime}, #{entity.kmzCreateByUserId}, #{entity.kmzUpdateTime}, #{entity.kmzUpdateByUserId}, #{entity.kmzCompanyId}, #{entity.kmzDes})
on duplicate key update kmz_name = values(kmz_name) , kmz_path = values(kmz_path) , kmz_type = values(kmz_type) , kmz_version = values(kmz_version) , kmz_size = values(kmz_size) , kmz_distance = values(kmz_distance) , kmz_duration = values(kmz_duration) , kmz_create_time = values(kmz_create_time) , kmz_create_by_user_id = values(kmz_create_by_user_id) , kmz_update_time = values(kmz_update_time) , kmz_update_by_user_id = values(kmz_update_by_user_id) , kmz_company_id = values(kmz_company_id) , kmz_des = values(kmz_des)
mapper.update:
update ef_task_kmz
kmz_name = #{kmzName},
kmz_path = #{kmzPath},
kmz_type = #{kmzType},
kmz_version = #{kmzVersion},
kmz_size = #{kmzSize},
kmz_distance = #{kmzDistance},
kmz_duration = #{kmzDuration},
kmz_create_time = #{kmzCreateTime},
kmz_create_by_user_id = #{kmzCreateByUserId},
kmz_update_time = #{kmzUpdateTime},
kmz_update_by_user_id = #{kmzUpdateByUserId},
kmz_company_id = #{kmzCompanyId},
kmz_des = #{kmzDes},
where id = #{id}
